name: devorto/queue
description: Simple queue implementation. Load / Run queue commands (with custom storage support).

suggest.symfony/console: To allow easy support of running the command queue (see src/Commands/Run).
suggest.devorto/dependency-injection: To allow easy support of running the command queue (see src/Commands/Run).
suggest.psr/log: To allow easy support of running the command queue (see src/Commands/Run).
